expert.description:
{Expert Bless}

Causes a group of friendly units on medium area to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat.

{Expert Curse}

Causes a group of enemy units on medium area to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat.

{Expert Counterstrike}

A group of friendly units on medium area will retaliate against two additional attacks each round.

{Expert Forgetfulness}

Causes enemy units on medium area to forget to use their ranged attack in combat.
